sentences.english: Separated from the Government Information Services and became an independent department under the Controller of Broadcasting.

sentences.english: The usis library should have some catalogs.

sentences.english: Book flights to Geneva Cointrin Airport from Dublin Airport and conservation.

sentences.english: Government Public Relations office took over broadcasting operations.
sentences.chinese: 廣播工作由政府新聞處接管。
